query.oql: select G.title, (select year: v, N: count(partition) from v in G.values group by year: v) as stats from ( select distinct title, (select year from partition) as values from authors A group by title: A.title) G
query.qrawl: select G.title, (select year: v, N: count(partition) from v in G.values group by year: v) as stats from ( select distinct title, (select year from partition) as values from authors A group by title: A.title) G
